title: Acne Scars & Marks Treatment in Pune

children.text: Acne Scars & Marks Treatment in Pune - Smooth, Clear Skin with The Skin Firm
Advanced dermatologist-led treatments to fade acne scars, lighten marks, and restore even skin texture under the care of Skin Specialist & Dermatologist Dr. Karishma Singh.
What Are Acne Scars & Marks?
Even after acne heals, many people are left with scars and marks that can linger for years.
Acne Scars - Permanent changes in skin texture such as pits, depressions, or raised areas caused by deep acne inflammation.
Acne Marks (Post-Inflammatory Hyperpigmentation) - Dark spots or reddish-brown patches left behind after pimples heal.
Both can affect your skin’s smoothness and your confidence but with the right treatment, they can be effectively reduced.
Why Choose Acne Scar & Mark Treatment at The Skin Firm?

We know how frustrating it feels when breakouts fade, but scars and marks remain. At The Skin Firm, we go beyond surface-level fixes; all our treatments are designed to heal, resurface and rejuvenate your skin.
Why patients trust us:
How Our Acne Scar Treatment Works
We identify scar types (ice-pick, boxcar, rolling, pigmentation) and design a personalised plan.
May include lasers, microneedling RF, chemical peels, or combination therapy.
Sessions are comfortable and target scars at their root by stimulating collagen and skin renewal.
We provide dermatologist-approved skincare and sun protection to maintain results.

Post-Care After Acne Scar Treatments
Minimal to Moderate Downtime - depends on procedure
Mild Redness/Swelling - usually subsides in 1-3 days
Peeling/Flaking - common after peels or laser
Makeup & Sun Protection - sunscreen essential; makeup can usually be resumed 24-48 hrs
Gradual Results - scars fade over multiple sessions
Post-Care After Acne Scar Treatments
Avoid touching or picking your skin

Who Can Benefit from Acne Scar & Marks Treatment?
Teenagers & adults with post-acne pigmentation
People with pitted or depressed scars
Those with stubborn dark spots from acne

FAQs on Acne Scars & Marks Treatment in Pune

items.question: Can acne scars be completely removed?

children.text: Most scars can be significantly improved, though very deep scars may not vanish 100%. Treatments smoothen and lighten them greatly.

items.question: How many sessions are needed for results?

children.text: Usually 3-6 sessions, depending on scar severity and treatment type.
Most treatments are well-tolerated. Numbing cream is used to keep you comfortable.

items.question: How soon will I see results?

children.text: Improvements begin after 2–3 sessions, with continued results over months.

items.question: Are acne scar treatments safe for darker skin?

children.text: Yes, all our procedures at The Skin Firm are customised and safe for Indian skin tones.

items.question: Do acne marks (dark spots) fade on their own?

children.text: Mild marks may fade with time, but deeper pigmentation often needs treatment.

items.question: Which treatment is best for pitted scars?

children.text: Microneedling RF and fractional lasers work best for deep scars.
Minimal to moderate, depending on the procedure. Most people return to work the next day.

items.question: Can men also get acne scar treatment?

children.text: Absolutely, many of our patients are men looking to improve their skin confidence.
Treated scars don’t return, but new acne can cause new scars. Maintenance skincare is key.
